text: "You're All I Need to Get By" is a 1968 song by Marvin Gaye and Tammi Terrell from their album You're All I Need. It went to number 7 in the United States, number 19 in the United Kingdom and number 17 in Canada. It was covered by Johnny Mathis featuring Denice Williams in 1978 for their album That's What Friends Are For and went to number 47 in the United States, number 45 in the United Kingdom and number 52 in Canada. It was also covered by Aretha Franklin in 1971 and Tony Orlando & Dawn in 1975. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Marvin Gaye songs Category:Diana Ross songs Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:Johnny Mathis songs Category:Deniece Williams songs Category:Emma Bunton songs Category:Tony Orlando & Dawn songs
title: You're All I Need to Get By
